page.title: 19ATTITUDES
page.content: Everyone we interviewed at the Regent Centre all knew about Beecraigs Country Park.We interviewed twenty five people and they all thought that Beecraigs was an excellent idea.A few people said they had been fishing at Beecraigs in the past.Some people liked,or would have liked to try walking,climbing,archery,fishing,using the trim course and the barbecues. Nobody wanted to do canoeing or sailing.A few people went to art and craft demonstrations. Anna and I went to the Cross to interview people. When the numbers of people had been put together we found that 75% of those interviewed knew of the activities at Beecraigs. 55% went to the park about once a month,15% went more than once a week. Everybody thought the park a good idea
